author: Pruthvi-ch
body:
PR description:

Upgrade Cell testing code for all types partial wafer and placement index for V17 HGCal Geometry

PR validation:

Use cfg's in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python/testHGCalPartialCellTester_cfg.py

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Adding feature to run cell testing for all Partial typeas and Placement Index v17 HGCal
